titleStmt.title: An answer to several letters written by Scotish gentlemen in His Majesties dominions beyond the seas to the master & governors of the Scotish Corporation and Hospital in London, giving a true account of the erection of the said company, and its progress from the year 1664, to 1677, for the satisfaction of such as desire that information.
titleStmt.author: Renney, John.
Scottish Corporation in London.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: John Renney, present master.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
